actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that interest on certain mortgages sold by savings and loan institutions will be exempt from Federal income tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that interest on real estate mortgages made by savings and loan institutions will be exempt from Federal income tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that interest on certain mortgages sold by savings and loan institutions will be exempt from Federal income tax.
